title: Dame Ijiwaru H
sinopse:
1. Junai Strip (Pure Love Strip) [Mayu Shinjou]
2. Bijo na Yajuu (Beautiful Beast) [Haruko Kurumatani]
3. Kiss de Mezame Sasete. (Morning Waking Kiss.) [Shiho Watanabe]
4. Daisy [Yuko Amane]
5. Retsujou Darling (Lustful Darling) [Ryuu Yuuhi]
6. Koi-hime to W-oujisama (Love Princess and W Prince) [Saki Aikawa]
7. Yuuwaku Nyannyan (Alluring Nyan Nyan) [Miki Toriyama]
